verbs.description: Britain [V: will] put on a display of military might when Donald Trump visits next month – with a flypast of its American - made fighter planes .
[ARG0: Britain] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: put] on [ARG1: a display of military might] [ARGM-TMP: when Donald Trump visits next month] – [ARG2: with a flypast of its American - made fighter planes] .
Britain will put on a display of military might when Donald Trump visits next month – with a flypast of its [ARG0: American] - [V: made] [ARG1: fighter planes] .
